definition: to reverse in position, order, or relationship
to turn inside out or upside down
to find the mathematical reciprocal of
examples: to divide using fractions, invert the divisor and multiply

definition: to reincorporate (a company) as a new entity in a foreign country : to put (a company) through the process of inversion (see inversion sense 6)
examples: Obama and Democratic leaders in Congress have questioned the patriotism of corporate executives who elect to invert their companies.
